com.threecrickets.prudence
Class PrudenceRouter

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.routing.Router
          com.threecrickets.prudence.util.ResolvingRouter
              com.threecrickets.prudence.util.CapturingRouter
                  com.threecrickets.prudence.util.FallbackRouter
                      com.threecrickets.prudence.PrudenceRouter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Uniform
public class PrudenceRouter
extends FallbackRouter

A Router with shortcut methods. Inherits all functionality from FallbackRouter, CapturingRouter and ResolvingRouter.

Author:
Tal Liron

Method Detail

attach

public Route attach(String uriTemplate,
                    String targetClassName)
             throws ClassNotFoundException
Attach a ServerResource with the specified class name. The class is loaded using this class's class loader.

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
targetClassName - The target Resource class to attach
Returns:
The created route
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - If the named class was not found
See Also:
Router.attach(String, Class)

attachBase

public Route attachBase(String uriTemplate,
                        String targetClassName)
                 throws ClassNotFoundException
As attach(String, String), but enforces matching mode Template.MODE_STARTS_WITH.

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
targetClassName - The target Resource class to attach
Returns:
The created route
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - If the named class was not found
See Also:
Router.attach(String, Class)

                    String documentName,
                    Context context,

redirectClient

public Route redirectClient(String uriTemplate,
                            String targetUriTemplate)
Redirects a URI to a new URI with HTTP status 307 ("temporary"). You can use template variables in the URIs.

Enforces matching mode Template.MODE_EQUALS.

This is handled via a NormalizingRedirector.

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
targetUriTemplate - The target URI template
Returns:
The created route
See Also:
NormalizingRedirector

redirectClientBase

public Route redirectClientBase(String uriTemplate,
                                String targetUriTemplate)
As redirectClient(String, String), but enforces matching mode Template.MODE_STARTS_WITH.

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
targetUriTemplate - The target URI template
Returns:
The created route
See Also:
NormalizingRedirector

redirectClient

public Route redirectClient(String uriTemplate,
                            String targetUriTemplate,
                            int statusCode)
Redirects a URI to a new URI. You can use template variables in the URIs.

Enforces matching mode Template.MODE_EQUALS.

This is handled via a NormalizingRedirector.

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
targetUriTemplate - The target URI template
statusCode - HTTP status code (must be 301, 302, 303 or 307)
Returns:
The created route
See Also:
NormalizingRedirector

redirectClientBase

public Route redirectClientBase(String uriTemplate,
                                String targetUriTemplate,
                                int statusCode)

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
targetUriTemplate - The target URI template
statusCode - HTTP status code (must be 301, 302, 303 or 307)
Returns:
The created route
See Also:
NormalizingRedirector

public Route capture(String uriTemplate,
                     String internalUriTemplate)
As CapturingRouter.capture(String, String, boolean), with capturing of query.

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
internalUriTemplate - The internal URI path to which we will redirect
Returns:
The created route

                         String internalUriTemplate,

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
internalUriTemplate - The internal URI path to which we will redirect
captureQuery - Whether to capture the query, too

The created route

captureAndHide

public Route captureAndHide(String uriTemplate,
                            String internalUriTemplate,
                            boolean captureQuery)
Shortcut for calling capture(String, String) and hide(String).

Parameters:
uriTemplate - The URI path template that must match the relative part of the resource URI
internalUriTemplate - The internal URI path to which we will redirect
captureQuery - Whether to capture the query, too
Returns:
The created route (for the capture, not the hide)

internalUriTemplate - The internal URI path to which we will redirect

The created route

hide

public void hide(String uri)
Sets the URI to always return Status.CLIENT_ERROR_NOT_FOUND. Note that if there really is a resource at that URI, it might still be available via other routes.

Hiding is explicitly disabled for the RIAP protocol.

Parameters:
uri - The URI path that must match the remaining part of the resource URI

public void handle(Request request,
                   Response response)
